summary: Completed comprehensive E2E testing of ArcTrack School ERP landing page. Backend APIs 100% functional (9/9 tests passed). Frontend mostly working with lead form submission flow complete. Found email validation issue on frontend.

ui_bugs.issue: Email validation not working on frontend - accepts invalid email formats
ui_bugs.details: Frontend form accepts invalid emails like 'invalid-email' without showing validation error. Backend properly rejects with 422, but frontend validation missing.

integration_issues.issue: Dropdown options timeout on mobile viewport during selection
integration_issues.workaround: Works on desktop, mobile touch events may need adjustment

passed_tests: Lead creation with valid data (201 Created)
Form validation for invalid phone numbers
Form validation for missing required fields
Lead form submission and redirect to success page
Calendly widget loading on success page
Solution Pillars interactive tabs switching (Revenue, Communication, Operations)
Navigation links functionality (Features, Pricing, Free Website)
WhatsApp floating button presence and positioning
All CTA buttons opening form modal
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix email validation on frontend in LeadCaptureForm.js - add proper email format validation before form submission to match backend validation standards
